title: Pls add a diff way to click thresh's lantern
body: It's kinda hard to port to thresh with his lantern when there's a fat @ss chogath on it.

replies.body:
You on drugs?
we all said this

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hmUAopAU,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-05-10T05:18:07.764+0000)
>
> Yeah but he said the size of cho made him unable to use it

Any champ can stop people from getting on it, size just makes it look harder
Kill the Cho that is standing on it, then click it.
That's the point, that's how you're supposed to counter Thresh's lantern, was that not obvious enough?
{{champion:31}} : "Is my arse too big for your taste? I am quite proud of it though.."
If its an enemy cho gath thats kinda the point. if its your cho gath doing it by trollign report them ez (doesn thappen often)
